ICP registration operation analysis

Final renewal date is July 201

7 Registration type

Initial registration
Original registration in Azure Cloud: Add a website, registration changes, registration sign off
Original registration not in Azure Cloud: newly added website, newly added access

Registration of specific operations

1. ICP registration procedures


2. Registration requirements for each province
Before registering, first know your own local administration’s registration requirements, this will make your audit by your local administration go smoothly.
Download all provincial administration special requirements

3. Registration of specific operations
3.1 Sign on to account
3.1.1 Sign on to registration account
Login websitehttps://icp.cloud.21vianet.com

  1. Click on “User sign on”
  2. Enter sign on mailbox. the system can default to using your sign on mailbox as your login account. If the mailbox has already been signed into, then please change to another mailbox
  3. Read and agree to the service agreement


3.1.2 Fill in account information


3.2 Enter registration information
3.2.1 Log into registration system, click on “New Registration”, and verify the page
Fill in registration domain name and host certification information. The system can, based on the domain and host certification number, check whether a registration record already exists if the certificate number was already registered under an old domain without a registration record but maintained as a new website.


3.2.2 If it is a newly added website, you will be prompted to enter the website information

  1. Website name: you cannot use the domain or URL as the website name; if the host is not a national-level website, it cannot use “China” in the name.
  2. Webpage URL: Fill in the top level domain corresponding to the web address (for example www.abc.com); based on current administrative regulations, register the main top level domain and if the top level domain is an already registered second level domain it can usually be used.
  3. If the person responsible for the website and the person responsible for the host are not the same person, fill in separate mobile numbers and email addresses to distinguish them and the two cannot be the same.
  4. When a website is newly added, we suggest that the host information be examined first. If the host information and actual conditions are not the same, the host information should be amended and the registration should be changed; After the registration has been administratively approved, re-add the website (note: when amending main information, you can’t carry out new-add operations).


3.2.3 Website access information

  1. Website IP address: must be filled out as part of your company’s network segment IP address.
  2. Website access methods: Users in Zhejiang Tianjin select “virtual host”, users in other areas select “other method”.
  3. Server placement: Select “Beijing” or “Shanghai”.


3.3 Upload registration material
Attention:

  1. Any attachments should be “original color scans” or “original document pictures” in jpg format.
  2. Mainland China identity cards must be valid for 3 months. Identity cards must be uploaded as an image.
  3. “Website registration information authentication checklist” only requires filling in “Website host name” (registered host name) and “website domain” (does not require adding www.). Additionally, “Signature of person responsible for website) signature location requires a seal (each person registered must provide a seal). Do not fill in any information in “examiner signature and unit seal”.
  4. Domain Certificate: If the domain is registered domestically, check the directly connecting domain; if the domain is registered overseas, check the information via Whois on the Internet and provide a screenshot. The domain’s owner and registration authority must be clearly visible.
  5. The domain certificate registrar must be the host or legal representative.


6. If it doesn’t involve a previous examination and approval page, then click on “return to home page”.


3.4 Submit a registration information note
1. After information is validated, click “submit registration” and wait for an initial check.
2. If many website applications need to be submitted, return to the verification page and open the new registration workflow. In addition, if many websites are submitted, only 3 can be submitted at a time, you must wait until each batch is administratively approved before submitting more.
3. To ensure the audit goes through, don’t turn on privacy protection during the audit.


3.5 Registration tasks after registration information is submitted

  1. After submitting registration, we will conduct an audit within 2 business days and will let you know by mail or phone if there are any problems. Please make sure your phone is available and check your mail.
  2. After the initial audit, we will mail you with the next steps. According to the mail, take a picture and the original website authentication list + network security responsibility agreement to the Azure in-person signing address, or take your own picture and mail the materials.
  3. In-person signing address:
    Beijing (this is also the address to mail materials to): No. 1, Jiuxianqiao East Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing Telephone: 4000890365
    Shanghai: Room 657, Building 3, No. 88, Keyuan Road, Pudong District, Shanghai Telephone: 4000890365
  4. After we have received the paper documents and photographs, we will carry out an audit within 1.5 working days . If there are any problems during the audit period, we will call or email you about the material that has a problem. Please ensure that your phone line is open and check your mail. Once your information is found accurate and is verified, we will immediately report it to the administration.
  5. After registration is completed, the administration will notify the host’s responsible person by mail and text.
    Additionally: The audit period for local provincial administrations is estimated. (Note: the audit period is ultimately up to the administration)
    3 Weeks：Gansu, Yunnan
    2 Weeks: Beijing, Zhejiang, Hubei, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Guangxi, Hebei, Heilongjiang, Inner Mongolia
    1 Week: Guangdong, Jiangsu, Sichuan, Henan, Shanxi, Anhui, Fujian, Guizhou, Liaoning, Hainan, Hunan, Xinjiang, Shanxi, Ningxia, Chongqing
    3 Days: Shanghai
  6. After the registration information is submitted: you can check on the progress of registration through the registration module.


7. If the administrative audit is not passed, we will call and mail you to inform you of the reason and assist you in submitting additional information. Please ensure your phone is available and check your mail.
